column1: #I find that the harder I work the more luck I seem to have. – Thomas Jefferson
#Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out. – Robert Collier
#There are no shortcuts to any place worth going. – Beverly Sills
#The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary. – Vidal Sassoon
#You don’t drown by falling in the water you drown by staying there. – Ed Cole

column3: close your eyes. Fools may laugh at me
column4: but wise men will know what I mean.

column5: of little consequence. The only consequence is what we do.
